title: Cisco discloses new IOS XE zero-day exploited to deploy malware implant
description: Cisco disclosed a new high-severity zero-day (CVE-2023-20273) today, actively exploited to deploy malicious implants on IOS XE devices compromised using the CVE-2023-20198 zero-day unveiled earlier this week. [...]

title: Okta says its support system was breached using stolen credentials
description: ​Okta says attackers accessed files containing cookies and session tokens uploaded by customers to its support management system after breaching it using stolen credentials. [...]

title: Ragnar Locker ransomware developer arrested in France
description: Law enforcement agencies arrested a malware developer linked with the Ragnar Locker ransomware gang and seized the group's dark web sites in a joint international operation. [...]

title: Critical RCE flaws found in SolarWinds access audit solution
description: Security researchers found three critical remote code execution vulnerabilities in the SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) product that remote attackers could use to run code with SYSTEM privileges. [...]

title: Kwik Trip finally confirms cyberattack was behind ongoing outage
description: Two weeks into an ongoing IT outage, Kwik Trip finally confirmed that it's investigating a cyberattack impacting the convenience store chain's internal network since October 9. [...]

title: Fake Corsair job offers on LinkedIn push DarkGate malware
description: A threat actor is using fake LinkedIn posts and direct messages about a Facebook Ads specialist position at hardware maker Corsair to lure people into downloading info-stealing malware like DarkGate and RedLine. [...]

title: Over 40,000 Cisco IOS XE devices infected with backdoor using zero-day
description: More than 40,000 Cisco devices running the IOS XE operating system have been compromised after hackers exploited a recently disclosed maximum severity vulnerability tracked as CVE-2023-20198. [...]
